title: Fart for Android Wear
summary: Trigger different fart sounds with the help of your Android Wear watch

description: Turn your Android Wear smartwatch into an awesome Remote Control Fart Machine. Trigger different fart sounds with the help of your watch. Be the fart master and create funny jokes and hilarious situations at a press of a button.Easy way to prank people, great for using at school, during meetings or at parties.Included:One of the best Android Wear apps★ 9 Different farts that can be triggered remotely from your smartwatch ★ 1 Free\Gratis Fart, you can get others through in-app purchases in Fart Market.
descriptionHTML:
Turn your Android Wear smartwatch into an awesome Remote Control Fart Machine.

Trigger different fart sounds with the help of your watch. Be the fart master and create funny jokes and hilarious situations at a press of a button.

Easy way to prank people, great for using at school, during meetings or at parties.
Included:

One of the best Android Wear apps

★ 9 Different farts that can be triggered remotely from your smartwatch
★ 1 Free\Gratis Fart, you can get others through in-app purchases in Fart Market.
comments: Stopped working! Was good but after acoulke of days all of my purchased "farts" we're unavailable. However it did say that I had already purchased them. I would like a refund please.
Awful. I paid for the app to get all the farts. It keeps telling me on the watch I need to pay. Daylight robbery. Do not buy. It's ridiculous. Definitely a scam.

Bought all 9 but not syncing all to my motorcycle 360 Only normal is working,  but my phone app says I bought them all. How long does it take to sync all 9? I paid for the app,  phone confirmed I paid,  but moto 360 still says I have to pay.? Fix it please or return my money.   Marco
It does not show up AT ALL on my smart watch.  Shows a purchase screen on my phone with no player.  Feel completely ripped off and looking for a refund
Paid for the extras and they arent working. Scam app?  Paid and only the freebie one works.  Do not buy!
